name: Beach Bummer
goalMessage: Keep cleaning up the beach to earn the Beach Bummer Badge!

name: Recycle Rager
goalMessage: Keep on recycling and you'll be a Recycler Rager in no time!

name: Species Pro
goalMessage: Them animals really appreciate you profiling them!

name: Plastic Pal
goalMessage: Micro-plastics? More like Micro-tastic! That's you!

name: Master of the Tides
goalMessage: The tides will bow to you soon!
